channel.title: Dead Frontier - Free to play Zombie MMO! BROWSER BASED 3D!
channel.description:
Wow, I stumbled on this by just searching on google, its a browser based game and is in 3D. Try it out, by clicking [url=http://fairview.deadfrontier.com/refer.php?ID=2831516&SERVER=fairview.deadfrontier.com]http://fairview.deadfrontier.com/refer.php?ID=2831516&SERVER=fairview.deadfrontier.com [/url]
Yes it is a referal link, but every person who signs up, I get 5000$ which I will use to buy stuff for you guys. So technically it's something like RuneScape, you kill zombies and level up your different stats. ex: Accuracy. As you level up you can equip different guns. You can find they're wiki via this link. [url=http://deadfrontier.wikia.com/wiki/Dead_Frontier_Wiki]http://deadfrontier.wikia.com/wiki/Dead_Frontier_Wiki[/url]
So yeah, try it out, It's really fun.
